title: ISic020037. ISic020037
body:
Facsimile Images

1

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Agostiniani 1977 (IAS I)

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

Hourglass-shaped sign recurrent as a mark throughout the ancient world. Agostiniani (1977, pp.14-15) considers this type to be distinct from the other inscriptions with hourglass-shaped symbols (see IAS_38-42). However, the symbol of this inscription seems to be ascribable to the same typology.

bibliography

  • Agostiniani 1977 37 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002201
  • Tusa 1970 no.42 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002567
